total-control
  • Total-control project documentation
  • View page source

Total-control project documentationÔÉÅ

Total Control is a project that provides a comprehensive framework for underactuated systems, including firmware, electronics, and Python API documentation. It is designed to facilitate education in control systems and reinforcement learning research.

Key Features:

  • Easy API: Control motors/sensors via Python

  • Education Focus: Lab-ready with safety limits and tutorials

  • Plug-and-Play: Automatic USB detection and Docker support

  • Open Source: MIT License, contributions welcome

  • Documentation: Detailed guides for firmware, electronics, and API usage

Contents:

  • Installation
  • API Reference
  • Firmware Documentation
  • Electronics and Schematics
